item.title: 7 highlights from the NTAs - from dogs to trophy stealing
item.description: From cute dogs to trophy stealing, it was a night of chaotic fun at the National Television Awards.

item.title: Mercury Prize 2021: Arlo Parks wins for Collapsed In Sunbeams
item.description: Soul singer Arlo Parks scoops the 2021 Mercury Prize for her debut album, Collapsed In Sunbeams.

item.title: National Television Awards 2021: Ant and Dec 'overwhelmed' by 20th win
item.description: The duo have won the TV presenting prize at the National Television Awards every year since 2001.

item.title: Channel 4: Big Breakfast returns for Black To Front takeover day
item.description: AJ Odudu and Mo Gilligan lead an all-day takeover of black talent on Channel 4.

item.title: The Matrix 4: Trailer gives first taste of Keanu Reeves' sci-fi comeback
item.description: White rabbits, an exploding train and a plastic duck are just some of the treats in store for fans.

item.title: National Television Awards 2021: The best red carpet images
item.description: Thursday marked the first National Television Awards ceremony since January 2020.

item.title: Janey Godley dropped from government Covid ads over tweets
item.description: The Glasgow comedian admitted the tweets, from several years ago, had "terrible, horrific undertones".

item.title: Women's Prize for Fiction: Susanna Clarke wins for 'truly original' comeback
item.description: Seventeen years after her acclaimed debut, Susanna Clarke's follow-up Piranesi wins the Â£30,000 prize.

item.title: Respect: Jennifer Hudson on embodying soul legend Aretha Franklin
item.description: The singer was personally selected by soul legend Franklin to play her in the new biopic Respect.

item.title: Baby Queen: Meet pop's boldest, sharpest new voice
item.description: "I have a problem releasing music that doesn't feel significant," says Bella Latham, aka Baby Queen.

item.title: Britney Spears: Singer's conservatorship case explained
item.description: The ongoing arrangement has sparked a public backlash from fans who support the #FreeBritney movement.

item.title: Sarah Harding: She was always going at 100mph
item.description: The team behind Girls Aloud's biggest hits remember Sarah Harding who's died at the age of 39.

item.title: The charm of French film great Jean-Paul Belmondo
item.description: Star of Breathless, Jean-Paul Belmondo was one of France's most popular actors.

item.title: 'An irrepressible and immensely likeable pop star'
item.description: The late singer was an irrepressible and immensely likeable pop star with a "wild child" reputation.

item.title: Girls Aloud singer Sarah Harding - her life in pictures
item.description: From Popstars: The Rivals to chart-topping, award-winning success and a Celebrity Big Brother win.

item.title: National Television Awards: Stars hit the red carpet
item.description: It's the first big awards night for British TV since the pandemic began.

item.title: Genesis: Tour âputting it to bedâ after 54 years
item.description: The singer is returning on tour with Genesis despite ongoing health problems.

item.title: Usain Bolt talks about his new music career
item.description: Eight-time Olympic champion Usain Bolt talks to BBC Sport's Ade Adedoyin about his ambitions for a career in music, Tokyo 2020, the women's 100m world record, and Cristiano Ronaldo's return to Manchester United.

item.title: The rapper giving away school uniforms to kids on free school meals
item.description: Inspired by Marcus Rashford, Jords has donated over 100 blazers to children on free school meals.

item.title: JLS comeback: 'The energy is still there'
item.description: The hit boy band tell Radio 1 Newsbeat why they're back after an eight-year break.

item.title: Sarah Harding dies: The Girls Aloud icon's life in video
item.description: The singer, who announced she had breast cancer in August 2020, has died at the age of 39.
